fields.content:
### PyCon relies on corporate sponsors to make PyCon happen every year. PyCon 2011 will bring together an estimated 1500 Python developers and enthusiasts from a variety of backgrounds. Your sponsorship helps keep PyCon affordable and accessible to the widest possible audience - and helps you connect to the Python community. [A wide variety of sponsorships are available](/2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus") to match your goals and your budget. Don't see what you want? Contact us, we are flexible and willing to work with you. With your help PyCon 2012 will be the best yet!

Available sponsorships

* [Diamond level Sponsoships (limited)][diamond] * [Platinum level Sponsorship (limited)][platinum] * [Gold level Sponsorship][gold] * [Silver level sponsorship][silver] * [Sprint sponsorships][sprint] * [Media sponsorships][media] * [Lanyard sponsorship][lanyard] [diamond]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [platinum]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [gold]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [silver]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [sprint]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [media]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus" [lanyard]: /2012/sponsors/prospectus/ "Sponsorship Prospectus"
fields._content_rendered:
PyCon relies on corporate sponsors to make PyCon happen every year.

PyCon 2011 will bring together an estimated 1500 Python developers and enthusiasts from a variety of backgrounds. Your sponsorship helps keep PyCon affordable and accessible to the widest possible audience - and helps you connect to the Python community.

A wide variety of sponsorships are available to match your goals and your budget. Don't see what you want? Contact us, we are flexible and willing to work with you.

With your help PyCon 2012 will be the best yet!

Available sponsorships

  • Diamond level Sponsoships (limited)
  • Platinum level Sponsorship (limited)
  • Gold level Sponsorship
  • Silver level sponsorship
  • Sprint sponsorships
  • Media sponsorships
  • Lanyard sponsorship
